alert.note: Alert for Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 2:35PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Julesburg and Holyoke, including I-76 over the northeast corner of Colorado. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on sharply reduced visibility and difficult if not impossible driving conditions. Road closures will be possible.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.
